resources.string: Embark on a journey with Gatherers Map, the app that allows you to mark and track your mushroom findings. Explore the world without losing your way and effortlessly keep track of your current location.\n\n Grant this app a permission to proceed. If you encounter any issues, you can manually enable it from the settings.
This app can work better if you give it the necessary permissions
Give location permissions, enable gps and network
To track your location on the map and use the full functionality, you must give permission
To use the application correctly, give permission to determine location in the settings.
